WorkItem.ClosedComment: Operating as intended, the only way to reduce it is to drop number of gemming templates active and/or number of gems marked
WorkItem.Description:
I just downloaded 2.3.9 and was about to oprimize my DPSDK.  An optimizer warning pops up that says -
"The following slots have a very large number of items selected:
Gems
Waist Items"
 
The reason I think there's a bug is because I currently only have 1 waist item (the one I'm wearing) marked available.  I've double-checked.  Item filters are at default (should be nothing disabled I think).
 
armory link:
http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Dawnbringer&cn=Celas
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Very large number of items error

Comments.Message: I read the posting guidelines.  While creating this thread there was no options box to the right.  After creating it, the work item details box is there but I've been unable to change the type, component, or release information.

The warning is based on the number of item instances, which means each possible gemming of the item. If you have a very large number of gems available this would result in there being a lot of belts even if you just have one item if that one has 3 slots.
